sourcesContent:
'use client'; import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; function Footer() { function loadBackgroudImages() { let backgroudImages = document.querySelectorAll('[data-background]'); if (backgroudImages.length > 0) { backgroudImages.forEach((element) => { let image = element.dataset.background; element.style.backgroundImage = `url('${image}')`; }); } } useEffect(() => { loadBackgroudImages(); }, []); return (

); } export default Footer;
